title: Sound 2: /b/ (ب)
description: Feel the short burst /b/ and connect it to its single-dot shape.
objective: Build recognition of the /b/ sound by pairing the audio with the correct letter form.

activities.prompt: Play the sound. Tap the shape that matches /b/.
Find the shape with one dot that fits the /b/ sound.
Listen and repeat /b/ with a quick lip pop.
